text: Club Unión Española S.A.D.P is a Chilean football club based in Independencia, Santiago, Chile. They won Primera División seven times and two Copa Chile titles. ==Honours== ===League=== * Chilean Primera Division (first tier) ** Winners (7): 1943, 1951, 1973, 1975, 1977, Apertura 2005, 2013 ** Runners-up (9): 1945, 1948, 1950, 1970, 1972, 1976, Clausura 2004, Apertura 2009, Clausura 2012 * Primera B (second tier) ** Winners (1): 1999 ===Cup=== * Copa Chile ** Winners (2): 1992, 1993 ** Runners-up (2): 1977, 1988 * Copa Invierno ** Winners (1): 1989 * Campeonato de Apertura ** Winners (1): 1947 * Supercopa de Chile ** Winners (1): 2013 * Liguilla Pre-Libertadores ** Winners (4): 1973, 1992, 1993, 2010 ===Continental=== * Copa Libertadores ** Runner-up (1): 1975 Category:Chilean football clubs
title: Unión Española
